item.title: 3/6 Disco Donny Dynamite’s “From the Record Store to the Dance Floor!”
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: BenmeR presents: Disco Donny Dynamite’s “From the Record Store to the Dance Floor!” A curated playlist of the many albums he bought that immediately made him have to see those artists live in concert. Tune in, drink along, and chat with the host and other attendees!
item.content:encoded:
BenmeR presents: Disco Donny Dynamite’s “From the Record Store to the Dance Floor!”
A curated playlist of the many albums he bought that immediately made him have to see those artists live in concert.

Tune in, drink along, and chat with the host and other attendees!

item.title: BenmeR & Whirlwind’s Light Em Up Chanukah Mega Party
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: BenmeR & Whirlwind’s “Light Em Up” Chanukah Mega Party We bring you 13 guest hosts, a but ton of candles, and a whole lotta jammin music for your holiday earball satisfaction Tune in, drink along, and compete in the chat with the host and other attendees!
item.content:encoded:
BenmeR & Whirlwind’s “Light Em Up” Chanukah Mega Party
We bring you 13 guest hosts, a but ton of candles, and a whole lotta jammin music for your holiday earball satisfaction

Tune in, drink along, and compete in the chat with the host and other attendees!

item.title: Live from SNRG / YOUTOPIA October 16-10, 2024
item.dc:creator: burnbrite
item.description: Shoutingfire is pleased to broadcast live from both the Southern Nevada (SNRG) and San Diego (YOUTOPIA), California Regional Burning Man Events, October 16 – 20, 2024.
item.content:encoded: Shoutingfire is pleased to broadcast live from both the Southern Nevada (SNRG) and San Diego (YOUTOPIA), California Regional Burning Man Events, October 16 – 20, 2024.

item.title: Live from Burning Flipside – A Texas Regional Event
item.dc:creator: sfeditor
item.description: Burning Flipside is a Burning Man Texas regional event. It is a place for radical self-expression and an experiment in temporary community building.Â Â The theme this year is Cosmic Critter Carnival Shouting Fire is bringing you live broadcasts from the event via KFLIP-FM.Â Â There are too many broadcast times to list and you are all […]
item.content:encoded:
Burning Flipside is a Burning Man Texas regional event. It is a place for radical self-expression and an experiment in temporary community building.Â  Â The theme this year is Cosmic Critter Carnival

Shouting Fire is bringing you live broadcasts from the event via KFLIP-FM.Â  Â There are too many broadcast times to list and you are all in dirfferent time zones so check the Shouting Fire broadcast schedule for all the show times displayed in your time zone.Â  https://shoutingfire.com/calendar

ğ“ğ®ğ§ğ ğ¢ğ§ ğ«ğ¢ğ ğ¡ğ­ ğ¡ğğ«ğ ğšğ­ ğ’ğ¡ğ¨ğ®ğ­ğ¢ğ§ğ ğ…ğ¢ğ«ğ.ğœğ¨ğ¦ ğ¨ğ« ğ¬ğğšğ«ğœğ¡ ğŸğ¨ğ« ğ’ğ¡ğ¨ğ®ğ­ğ¢ğ§ğ ğ…ğ¢ğ«ğ ğ¨ğ§ ğ¢ğ‡ğğšğ«ğ­ ğ‘ğšğğ¢ğ¨ ğ¨ğ« ğ“ğ®ğ§ğ ğˆğ§ ğ‘ğšğğ¢ğ¨. ğ–ğ ğšğ«ğ ğšğ¥ğ¬ğ¨ ğ¨ğ§ ğ­ğ¡ğ ğ‘ğšğğ¢ğ¨ ğ†ğšğ«ğğğ§ ğšğ©ğ©.

item.title: Live from AfrikaBurn 2024!
item.dc:creator: burnbrite
item.description: We are delighted to bring you a 24/7, live broadcast from the Radio Free Tankwa crew at AfrikaBurn. Learn more here. AfrikaBurn is the spectacular result of a community of participants who come together to create art, costume, performance, gifted and volunteered services, Theme Camps, music, Mutant Vehicles, and much, much more. It is a […]
item.content:encoded:
We are delighted to bring you a 24/7, live broadcast from the Radio Free Tankwa crew at AfrikaBurn. Learn more here.

AfrikaBurn is the spectacular result of a community of participants who come together to create art, costume, performance, gifted and volunteered services, Theme Camps, music, Mutant Vehicles, and much, much more. It is a chance to invent the world anew.

The flagship AfrikaBurn event takes place in the Tankwa Karoo, at Quaggafontein Farm, located in the Western Cape Province of South Africa, around the end of April every year.

AfrikaBurn is the largest of many events across the globe that shareÂ Guiding PrinciplesÂ through affiliation with theÂ Burning Man Regional Network

…https://www.afrikaburn.org/about/

item.title: Silent Night with BenmeR & Whirlwind – Thurs 12/8 @ 6pm PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: Silent Night with BenmeR & Whirlwind Trying to do an upbeat holiday radio show with a baby sleeping in the room next door seems to be a bit of a challenge. So instead, we bring to your earballs the Silent Night broadcast! Chill music that hopefully will not disturb the little one.Â (plus if you […]
item.content:encoded:
Silent Night with BenmeR & Whirlwind
Trying to do an upbeat holiday radio show with a baby sleeping in the room next door seems to be a bit of a challenge. So instead, we bring to your earballs the Silent Night broadcast! Chill music that hopefully will not disturb the little one.Â  (plus if you tune in early, you may get to hear the Bean!)

item.title: BenmeR & Whirlwind & An Alien Keyboard – 10/13 @ 6PM PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: Not sure where this keyboard came from. Which one of these buttons does what?!?Â Hmm…Â looks like we figure it out live on the air! More songs picked at random for your earballs! Tune in, raise your glass, and interact at: www.shoutingfire.com/chat

item.title: ChillOut & Decompress with BenmeR – 9/8 @6pm PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: BenmeR presents a show for you to dust of all your gear, put your feet up, & chill out. Raise your dust filled glass, enjoy the tunes, and interact at: www.shoutingfire.com/chat
item.content:encoded:
BenmeR presents a show for you to dust of all your gear, put your feet up, & chill out.
Raise your dust filled glass, enjoy the tunes, and interact at: www.shoutingfire.com/chat

item.title: BenmeR & Friends – Burn Your Earballs! Thurs 9/1 @ 6pm PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: Whether you are in the desert or at home, your earballs got a special treat this Thursday night! The whole crew is gathering to broadcast some good mojo into the burn and share some special music to fuel your evening! Join the celebration & raise your dust filled glass! Â www.shoutingfire.com/chat
